channel.title: FurledSails.com - The worlds first sailing Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Christy and Noel Davis
channel.itunes:subtitle: Weekly sailing show that focuses on cruising and recreational sailing, but with occasional side trips to other interesting nautical subjects. Interviews include Lin and Larry Pardey, Tania Aebi, Sir Chay Blyth, Pete Goss, Reese Palley, Nick Moloney, Bob Bitchen, Capt. Woody, and many more.
